name: Açai Bowl
description: Antioxidant-rich Brazilian superfood bowl. Perfect for an energizing and healthy breakfast.

instructions.instruction: Add açai puree, frozen banana, blueberries, and almond milk to blender.

instructions.tip: If too runny, add more frozen fruit.

instructions.instruction: Top with granola, banana slices, strawberries, coconut, and chia seeds.

tips: Açai is rich in antioxidants - boosts immune system.
Add protein powder for a more filling meal.
Consistency should be thick like ice cream, not runny.
Change toppings based on seasonal fruits.
storageInfo: Must be consumed immediately. Does not store well.
servingSuggestion: Enjoy for breakfast or as a post-workout energy boost.
variations: Use pitaya (dragon fruit) for a pink bowl.
Add peanut butter for extra protein.
Add spinach for a green smoothie twist.
